attributes.action: call an end to the persecution of Falun Dafa practitioners in China and an immediate release of all family members of UK residents imprisoned inside China for practicing Falun Dafa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to call for an end to the persecution of Falun Dafa practitioners in China and for the immediate release of the family members of UK residents currently held in prison for practicing Falun Dafa in China.

Since 1999, more than 3,100 people have been persecuted to death; more than 1 million are currently held in forced labour camps and 100 million people have been forced to give up their belief in the principles of Truthfulness, Compassion and Tolerance.

Despite growing pressure from around the World, including the United Nations, U.S. Government, Amnesty International and Human Rights Watch, the persecution still continues today.

On this, the 10-year anniversary of the commencement of the persecution, we would like to ask you all to help make this the last year.
